section1.title: Live in harmony with the natural environment through modern living spaces designed just for you. With stunning landscape arrangements, every corner of your home will be filled with the sound of nature.

section2.title: We build the future today with energy-efficient and eco-friendly designs. By using natural resources efficiently, we create a healthy and balanced living environment.

section3.title: Standing out with its unique architecture, İVO Bio brings aesthetics and functionality together. Every detail enriches the user experience, adding elegance to your living spaces.

section4.title: A spacious and serene living area, combined with minimal design details and a peaceful atmosphere, awaits you at İVO Bio for a comfortable lifestyle.

section5.title: Clean air and natural surroundings form the foundation of a healthy life. İVO Bio perfectly balances summer and winter conditions, guaranteeing comfort in every season.

section6.title: Interiors designed with natural materials offer a warm and inviting atmosphere. The feeling of naturalness in every detail makes your living spaces at İVO Bio truly unique.

section7.title: İVO Bio’s smart home system makes your life more comfortable and controlled. With a single touch, your home adapts to your needs and simplifies your daily routine.

section8.title: With its flexible design that adapts to different lifestyles, İVO Bio meets your needs perfectly. Thanks to fast delivery and installation, you can reach your dream living space in no time.

technicalData.title: IVO Bio Technical
technicalData.description:
Produced with organic composite building technology compatible with the natural environment, IVO Bio offers an 85 m² modern and functional 2+1 living space.

• 1700 cm length
• 530 cm width
• 360 cm height

technicalData.title: Infrastructure Systems
technicalData.description:
IVO Bio stands out with fully equipped and self-sustaining infrastructure systems. With strong water management, high-capacity waste solutions, and renewable energy production, it offers users an independent living experience.

• 10-ton clean water capacity
• 10-ton septic storage system
• 10 kW solar energy production capacity

technicalData.title: Structural Features
technicalData.description:
IVO Bio offers year-round comfort and reliability with durable carrier systems, advanced insulation solutions, and premium exterior materials.

• 14-ton heavy steel construction
• Heat-insulated joinery systems
• Roof window installation
• Fire-resistant 30-density exterior wall foam
• Natural stone exterior cladding

technicalData.title: Smart Home Systems
technicalData.description:
IVO Bio offers a modern and practical lifestyle by allowing all systems—from security to climate control—to be managed from a single point with integrated smart home technologies.

• A-class energy consumption
• Lighting control
• Security and camera systems
• Intercom integration
• Curtain and shutter control
• Fire detection system
• Insect detection sensors
• Heating and cooling management

twoType.summer: With its modular living spaces, wide openings, and natural airflow, IVO Bio maximizes summer comfort. Its energy-efficient design transforms solar gain into comfort, providing a livable interior environment up to +60°C while offering a lifestyle fully harmonized with nature.
twoType.winter: With its highly insulated structure and smart climate-control solutions, IVO Bio maintains warmth during winter, creating an ideal living balance. Its durability down to –50°C ensures a comfortable, safe, and sustainable winter experience, no matter how harsh the external conditions are.

yekpare.yekpareFirst: With its monolithic body, İVO Bio

floorPlan.description: With 72.00 m² of net usable area, IVO Bio has a total gross area of 90.00 m². It is meticulously designed in a 2+1 open-kitchen concept, featuring a spacious living area and functional storage solutions for comfortable living.

floorInfo.subheader: You can choose the plan that suits you best

models.title: IVO Bio Basic
models.description: Designed for those who want to create their own style, this starter package offers users a free space. The structure is delivered with the exterior shell completed and electricity and water installations ready, allowing you to arrange it as you wish thanks to the completely empty interior. This way, you have the opportunity to shape every detail from decoration to room layout according to your own taste. With its affordable cost, it is an ideal solution for those seeking a practical and customizable start.

models.title: IVO Bio Economy
models.description: Designed for those who want to settle in quickly, this package offers a practical and comfortable solution. Thanks to the complete electricity and water installations, and the completion of painting, plastering, and wall treatments, you get a living space ready to use without wasting time. With the kitchen area and fixed furniture installed, you can bring your own movable furniture and settle in immediately. Thus, you can quickly achieve an effortless, organized, and balanced living environment.

models.title: IVO Bio Comfort
models.description: Fully equipped and completely ready to live in, this premium package is designed for those seeking the highest comfort. All installations and interior work are meticulously completed, offering a complete living space including fixed and movable furniture. With its modern kitchen and carefully arranged interior, you can move in and start living effortlessly right away. It is an ideal solution for those who want comfort, quality, and a ready-to-live experience all in one.

footer.brandDescription: IVO Bio is a Belen & Partners brand.
footer.description: We build the future together with modern architectural solutions and sustainable designs. In every project, we bring together aesthetics, functionality, and an environmentally friendly approach.

questions.question: What is IVO Bio?
questions.answer: IVO Bio is a modern housing solution that offers an eco-friendly, modular, and energy-efficient living space. With its unique architecture and sustainable structure, it provides a comfortable experience in all four seasons.

questions.question: Is it suitable for four-season use?
questions.answer: Yes, IVO Bio is designed for year-round use and performs comfortably between -50°C and +60°C.

questions.question: Is it portable?
questions.answer: Yes. Thanks to its modular structure, it can be easily transported to any desired location and offers fast installation.

questions.question: How is the energy requirement met?
questions.answer: IVO Bio meets its energy needs through solar panels, a smart inverter, and lithium battery systems. It can operate off-grid without being connected to the electrical grid.

questions.question: Is it compatible with smart home technology?
questions.answer: Yes. Lighting, heating-cooling systems, energy management, security systems, and door controls can all be managed through a mobile application.

questions.question: How long does it take to deliver an IVO Bio project?
questions.answer: Delivery times vary depending on the scope and features of the project, but an IVO Bio module can be produced in 7–10 days and installed in 1 day.
